verbose_text: Conversely, we found that a higher fraction of downregulated SE associated genes displayed a significant Pol II loss from the gene body than down-regulated non-SE-associated genes upon BRD4 displacement (XREF_FIG; snapshots of Pol II binding at OCT4 and PRDM14 in XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY; primers design for ChIP experiments in XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG are indicated in XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
